title: Marketplace Roundtable #27: Fishing For Deep Value In Shipping With J Mintzmyer
description: In the latest edition of the Marketplace Roundtable Podcast, J Mintzmyer discusses his bread and butter: the global shipping sector. Shipping stocks took a major thrashing in the last few months of 2018, meaning there are now several deep value picks within the sector trading at multi-year discounts.
itunes:title: Fishing For Deep Value In Shipping With J Mintzmyer
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A top-down and bottom-up view of the global shipping sector
